channel.title: VRT on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in VRT on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: AI Infrastructure: The Real Battlegrounds in Power, Cooling, & Networking
item.description: An in-depth investment analysis of the critical AI infrastructure market, focusing on the power and cooling bottleneck (Vertiv) and the networking battle between Ethernet (Arista) and InfiniBand (Nvidia).
